row.process:
! selon &EF# trouver le code ENTITE SITE :SET &CLE#=&EF#_&ENTITE_KISS# :SET &ENTITE_SITE#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.KISS, &CLE#,3) :SET &VCENTER_LIEN#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.VCENTER, &ENTITE_SITE#,1) :SET &VCENTER_COMPTE#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.VCENTER, &ENTITE_SITE#,2) :SET &VCENTER_MDP#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.VCENTER, &ENTITE_SITE#,3) :SET &VCENTER_LOCALISATION#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.VCENTER, &ENTITE_SITE#,4) :SET &VCENTER_VLAN#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.VCENTER, &ENTITE_SITE#,5) ! :IF &VCENTER_LIEN# = " " : PRINT KO: VCENTER VIDE : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,VCENTER:VIDE" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="VCENTER:VIDE" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK:VCENTER &VCENTER_LIEN# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,VCENTER:&VCENTER_LIEN#" :ENDIF
!:PUBLISH &EXIT_KISS_OK#,,"TOP" !:PUBLISH &EXIT_KISS_KO#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &VCENTER_LIEN#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &VCENTER_COMPTE#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &VCENTER_MDP#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &VCENTER_LOCALISATION#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &VCENTER_VLAN#,,"TOP"
